dialogue_turns.speaker: Listener message
dialogue_turns.text: Hi, love the show. Could you guys talk about the dollar to tenge exchange rate? I'm traveling to Almaty next week and trying to budget. Thanks, Alex from Boston.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hi, love the show. Could you guys talk about the dollar to tenge exchange rate? I'm traveling to Almaty next week and trying to budget. Thanks, Alex from Boston.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Alex from Boston wants to know about the dollar in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alex from Boston wants to know about the dollar in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh perfect timing, because as of April 18th, the weighted average on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange was 521.90 tenge per dollar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh perfect timing, because as of April eighteenth, the weighted average on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange was five hundred twenty one point nine zero tenge per dollar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the end of the daytime trading session on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average dollar exchange rate stood at 521.90 tenge, down by 1.28 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that was actually down by, uh, 1.28 tenge from the previous session.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that was actually down by, uh, one point two eight tenge from the previous session.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By the end of the daytime trading session on the Kazakhstan Stock Exchange (KASE), the weighted average dollar exchange rate stood at 521.90 tenge, down by 1.28 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so the dollar's weakening a bit against the tenge. The National Bank's official rate for that day was set a little higher though, at 523.20.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so the dollar's weakening a bit against the tenge. The National Bank's official rate for that day was set a little higher though, at five hundred twenty three point two zero.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The official rate set by the National Bank for April 18 is 523.20 tenge per dollar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And if you're actually exchanging cash in Almaty, the buying rate at exchange offices is around 521.09, so you'd get that for your dollars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And if you're actually exchanging cash in Almaty, the buying rate at exchange offices is around five hundred twenty one point zero nine, so you'd get that for your dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, the average dollar buying rate at exchange offices in Almaty is currently 521.09 tenge, while the selling rate is 523.38 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But if you're selling tenge to get dollars back, they'd charge you about 523.38.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if you're selling tenge to get dollars back, they'd charge you about five hundred twenty three point three eight.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to kurs.kz, the average dollar buying rate at exchange offices in Almaty is currently 521.09 tenge, while the selling rate is 523.38 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a bit different in Astana though—the spread is wider. Buying around 519, selling up near 526.57.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a bit different in Astana though-the spread is wider. Buying around five hundred nineteen, selling up near five hundred twenty six point five seven.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In Astana, the American currency is being bought at an average of 519.57 tenge and sold for 526.57 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So it really pays to shop around if you're exchanging physical cash in different cities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it really pays to shop around if you're exchanging physical cash in different cities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And this drop below, um, what was it—500? That was a big psychological barrier recently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And this drop below, um, what was itminus five hundred? That was a big psychological barrier recently.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, economists have been talking about the tenge's strengthening lately. It's been a topic for local financial experts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, economists have been talking about the tenge's strengthening lately. It's been a topic for local financial experts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Economists explain tenge's strengthening Earlier, financial market experts in Kazakhstan shared their forecasts for the dollar exchange rate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. So Alex, if you're heading to Almaty, you might get a slightly better rate there than in the capital.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. So Alex, if you're heading to Almaty, you might get a slightly better rate there than in the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely check kurs.kz for live averages before you go exchange a bunch of money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely check the website for live averages before you go exchange a bunch of money.
